request.description:
Basic Auth API
Accepts four keys in body:
{String} source: Consumer who is emitting the message.
{String} entity: Postman entity that changed.
{String} entityId: Id of the postman entity.
{String} action: Action performed on the entity.

Handler for the message must be registered on Search Service before sending messages.
